Comment: Mobile app works smoothly and has a clean interface.
Customer support was quick and professional.
Loan approval process was simple and fast.
I get instant alerts for every transaction.
App security features like OTP are reassuring.
Very helpful staff at the branch when I had questions.
Depositing cheques via app is easy and reliable.
Got my credit card limit increased without hassle.
Chatbot helped me find answers quickly.
Fingerprint login is fast and secure.
App sometimes freezes during login.
I didn't receive any callback after multiple complaints.
Loan application got rejected without explanation.
Unexpected charges were added to my account.
OTP fails to arrive occasionally.
Waiting time on support calls is too long.
Interest rates are higher than competitors.
Transactions are often delayed during weekends.
Had to reset password multiple times unnecessarily.
Customer care was not helpful at all.
The app layout is decent, nothing fancy.
Support was okay, but could be faster.
Loan process took time but eventually worked.
No major issues so far, using it mostly for balance checks.
Basic features work fine. Haven’t explored much.
I got a notification for each transaction. That’s good.
Still getting used to the interface, not bad though.
Support agent was polite, but needed supervisor's help.
Bank app works. Just works.
Loan terms were average. Nothing special.
